A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: For my money this is the greatest addition to the Star Wars legacy since \"The Empire Strikes Back\". Rian Johnson is a born filmmaker\, and he revitalizes this franchise in new and exciting ways. The story risks everything\, even the way of the Jedi\, in order to provide its characters with a place to grow and change\, much like life. And then there's the visuals and the humor. For much of the running time I watched this film with a huge smile on my face. It is a significant accomplishment that \"The Last Jedi\" can surprise and delight us so many decades into this franchise.
